message:
I, personally, will save some significant money on healthcare if his plan is implemented as proposed. Many of the people railing against him will too. I'm sick and tired of people saying we will have to wait forever to see a doctor, and that old people are going to die.
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
handout, just the opportunity to purchase insurance. People bitched about increased premiums, and I'm sorry about that, but they ignore people in my situation. Single-payer will benefit even more people. Americans apparently aren't as empathetic and generous as I had hoped, at least from the nasty comments I've been hearing.

message: Your carrier and your state does that . I work in this every single day. And yes it is a struggle at times. But the president has no control over what you pay. I have cancer patients who are 100% covered. No one but Obama Care would even cover them. They pay nothing for meds. Others not. It's state mandated. That's ridiculous! It works for some and not so much for others. Still not the presidents fault.
